meanings.definition: A game or match in which two teams of two players compete against each other.
meanings.sent1: During the school sports day, the foursomes in the relay race ran with all their might.
meanings.sent2: The golf tournament had exciting foursomes battling it out on the course.
meanings.sent3: The foursomes in the board game were so competitive that they kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: In the foursomes of life, sometimes teamwork is the key to winning.
meanings.sent5: The foursomes in the chess competition strategized carefully to outsmart their opponents.

meanings.definition: A group of four people playing together, especially in golf.
meanings.sent1: At the family reunion, the foursomes enjoyed a friendly game of golf together.
meanings.sent2: The golf course was filled with laughter as foursomes teed off on a sunny afternoon.
meanings.sent3: The foursomes at the mini-golf course were having so much fun that they lost track of time.
meanings.sent4: The foursomes on the golf course moved like a synchronized dance, each player complementing the others.
meanings.sent5: The foursomes in the golf tournament showed great sportsmanship and camaraderie throughout the game.
